languages.text: Usage of a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} by the psyker decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Когда псайкер совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} сокращается на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Usage of a heroic act by the Psyker restores the veil by <u>INT bonus</u>.
Usage of a heroic act by the psyker decreases veil degradation by <u>INT bonus</u>.
Usage of a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} by the psyker decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.

languages.text: 当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度会减轻{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}点。

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度会减轻，等同于灵能者的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: Cuando el psíquico usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en −{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.
